issues.message: Contact details (NAP) not clearly detected on page
No hreflang tags found (recommended for multi-region)

recommendations: 1. Add a descriptive <title> tag such as "[Business Name] – Your Local [Industry] Experts in [City]."
2. Insert a meta description like "Discover top-notch [service/product] at [Business Name]. Located in [City], we offer [key services] to meet your needs. Contact us today!"
3. Implement LocalBusiness schema to improve visibility in local search results; ensure it includes NAP (Name, Address, Phone Number).
4. Embed a Google Map of your location to enhance local SEO and provide easy directions for users.
5. Use hreflang tags if the site targets multiple regions, ensuring proper language and regional targeting for international visitors.

issues.message: Title length (93) is not optimal (30-60 chars)
Contact details (NAP) not clearly detected on page
No hreflang tags found (recommended for multi-region)

recommendations: Optimize title to: 'Maju Mapan Digital | AI-Driven Marketing & Creative Solutions in Indonesia'.
Add alt text for images to improve accessibility and SEO, e.g., 'Maju Mapan Team at Work'.
Include a canonical tag to consolidate duplicate URLs and strengthen SEO.
Embed a Google Map on your contact page to enhance local visibility.
Implement hreflang tags for regional targeting, improving user relevance for Indonesian audiences.
